title: Retrieve attributes for a category
description: Retrieves the list of attributes which are applicable to a specific category.

path.name: category
path.description: The category number for which you wish to see the attributes for. This must be a leaf category (for example, you cannot view the attributes for Computers > Desktops, but you can for Computers > Desktops > CRT monitors).

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A name which uniquely identifies the attribute. Required when selling or editing.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: The name of the attribute, in a form suitable for displaying to users. Not required when selling or editing.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of the attribute, which determines the range of acceptable values. Not required when selling or editing.

enum.name: Boolean
enum.description: The attribute value is a boolean (true/false).

enum.name: Integer
enum.description: The attribute value is an integer.

enum.name: Decimal
enum.description: The attribute value is a floating point number.

enum.name: String
enum.description: The attribute value can be arbitrary text.

enum.name: DateTime
enum.description: The attribute value is a date & time (in UTC).

fields.name: Range
fields.description: The allowed range of the attribute. Only applies to numeric attributes. Not required when selling or editing.

nested_fields.description: The lowest allowed value of the attribute.
The highest allowed value of the attribute.

fields.name: MaxStringLength
fields.description: The maximum allowed length of the attribute value, in characters. Only applies to string attributes. Some string attributes do not have a maximum length because they are restricted to a fixed list of options, or because any length is acceptable. Not required when selling or editing.

fields.name: Options
fields.description: A list of options, if the attribute is restricted to a fixed set of values. Not required when selling or editing.

nested_fields.description: The value of the item as a string.
What should be displayed for this value (often the same).

fields.name: Units
fields.description: A list of units that apply (MHz, hectares, etc). Only applies to numeric attributes. Not required when selling or editing.

nested_fields.description: The unit name, in a format suitable for displaying to a user (e.g. "MHz").
The multiplier to apply to the value the user entered to get a value suitable for passing to the sell API.

fields.name: IsRequiredForSell
fields.description: Indicates whether the attribute must be present when selling an item.

fields.name: GroupName
fields.description: Suggests the category name for the attribute grouping on the UI level.
